channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report E-2024120237
item.description:
Report E-2024120237

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 8500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 12/10 contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 6 ounces of product released to a 10‚Äù circle around the leg. The release was confirmed to be from a leaking weld/seam on the leg of the tote. The tote was patched, containment was placed around it, and it was staged for future transfer. On 12/11 when the new metal tote arrived onsite, contractors returned to transfer the product from the damaged metal tote into a new one. Each tote was then staged onsite to be returned to the customer. One 55-gallon metal drum of waste was generated containing rinse water from cleaning the hoses and absorbents that were used for the containment. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
